verses.verse: And He began <S%G757><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> to them in parables: <S%G3850><s%> "A man <S%G444><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> a vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and put <S%G4060><s%> a wall <S%G5418><s%> around <S%G4060><s%> it, and dug <S%G3736><s%> a vat <S%G5276><s%> under <S%G5276><s%> the wine <S%G5276><s%> press, <S%G5276><s%> and built <S%G3618><s%> a tower, <S%G4444><s%> and rented <S%G1554><s%> it out to vine-growers and went <S%G589><s%> on a journey. <S%G589><s%>

"And at the [harvest] time <S%G2540><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> a slave <S%G1401><s%> to the vine-growers, in order <S%G2443><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> [some] of the produce <S%G2590><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> from the vine-growers.
"And they took <S%G2983><s%> him, and beat <S%G1194><s%> him, and sent <S%G649><s%> him away <S%G649><s%> empty-handed.

"And again <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> them another <S%G243><s%> slave, <S%G1401><s%> and they wounded <S%G2775><s%> him in the head, <S%G2775><s%> and treated <S%G718><s%> him shamefully. <S%G818><s%>

"And he sent <S%G649><s%> another, <S%G243><s%> and that one <S%G2548><s%> they killed; <S%G615><s%> and [so with] many <S%G4183><s%> others, <S%G243><s%> beating <S%G1194><s%> some, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> and killing <S%G615><s%> others. <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%>

"He had <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> [to send,] a beloved <S%G27><s%> son; <S%G5207><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> him last <S%G2078><s%> [of all] to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'They will respect <S%G1788><s%> my son. <S%G5207><s%>'

"But those <S%G1565><s%> vine-growers said <S%G3004><s%> to one <S%G1438><s%> another, <S%G1438><s%> 'This <S%G3778><s%> is the heir; <S%G2818><s%> come, <S%G1205><s%> let us kill <S%G615><s%> him, and the inheritance <S%G2817><s%> will be ours! <S%G1473><s%>'
"And they took <S%G2983><s%> him, and killed <S%G615><s%> him, and threw <S%G1544><s%> him out of the vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

"What <S%G5101><s%> will the owner <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> do <S%G4160><s%>? He will come <S%G2064><s%> and destroy <S%G622><s%> the vine-growers, and will give <S%G1325><s%> the vineyard <S%G290><s%> to others. <S%G243><s%>

"Have you not even <S%G3761><s%> read <S%G314><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Scripture: <S%G1124><s%> 'The stone <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the builders <S%G3618><s%> rejected, <S%G593><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> the chief <S%G2776><s%> corner <S%G1137><s%> [stone];
This <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> about from the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And it is marvelous <S%G2298><s%> in our eyes <S%G3788><s%>'?"

And they were seeking <S%G2212><s%> to seize <S%G2902><s%> Him; and [yet] they feared <S%G5399><s%> the multitude; <S%G3793><s%> for they understood <S%G1097><s%> that He spoke <S%G3004><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> them. And [so] they left <S%G863><s%> Him, and went <S%G565><s%> away. <S%G565><s%>
And they sent <S%G649><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and Herodians <S%G2265><s%> to Him, in order <S%G2443><s%> to trap <S%G64><s%> Him in a statement. <S%G3056><s%>

And they came <S%G2064><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> that You are truthful, <S%G227><s%> and defer <S%G3199><s%> to no <S%G3762><s%> one; <S%G3762><s%> for You are not partial <S%G991><s%> <S%G4383><s%> to any, <S%G444><s%> but teach <S%G1321><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in truth. <S%G225><s%> Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to pay <S%G1325><s%> a poll-tax to Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> not?

"Shall we pay, <S%G1325><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> shall we not pay <S%G1325><s%>?" But He, knowing <S%G3609><s%> their hypocrisy, <S%G5272><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you testing <S%G3985><s%> Me? Bring <S%G5342><s%> Me a denarius <S%G1220><s%> to look <S%G3708><s%> at."

And they brought <S%G5342><s%> [one.] And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Whose <S%G5101><s%> likeness <S%G1504><s%> and inscription <S%G1923><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%>?" And they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Caesar's."

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Render <S%G591><s%> to Caesar <S%G2541><s%> the things that are Caesar's, and to God <S%G2316><s%> the things that are God's." And they were amazed <S%G7059><s%> at Him.

And [some] Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> (who <S%G3748><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that there is no <S%G3361><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%>) came <S%G2064><s%> to Him, and [began] questioning <S%G1905><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> for us that if <S%G1437><s%> a man's brother <S%G80><s%> dies, <S%G599><s%> and leaves <S%G2641><s%> behind <S%G2641><s%> a wife, <S%G1135><s%> and leaves <S%G863><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> child, <S%G5043><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> should take <S%G2983><s%> the wife, <S%G1135><s%> and raise <S%G1817><s%> up offspring <S%G4690><s%> to his brother. <S%G80><s%>

"There were seven <S%G2033><s%> brothers; <S%G80><s%> and the first <S%G4413><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> a wife, <S%G1135><s%> and died, <S%G599><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> offspring. <S%G4690><s%>

"And the second <S%G1208><s%> one <S%G1208><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> her, and died, <S%G599><s%> leaving <S%G2641><s%> behind <S%G2641><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> offspring; <S%G4690><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> likewise; <S%G5615><s%>

and [so] all <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> left <S%G863><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> offspring. <S%G4690><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> died <S%G599><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

"In the resurrection, <S%G386><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they rise <S%G450><s%> again, <S%G450><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> one's wife <S%G1135><s%> will she be? For all <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> her as wife. <S%G1135><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to them, "Is this <S%G3778><s%> not the reason <S%G1223><s%> you are mistaken, <S%G4105><s%> that you do not understand <S%G3609><s%> the Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> or <S%G3366><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

"For when <S%G3752><s%> they rise <S%G450><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> they neither <S%G3777><s%> marry, <S%G1060><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> are given <S%G7031><s%> in marriage, <S%G7031><s%> but are like <S%G5613><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"But regarding <S%G4012><s%> the fact <S%G3754><s%> that the dead <S%G3498><s%> rise <S%G1453><s%> again, <S%G1453><s%> have you not read <S%G314><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> in the [passage about the burning] bush, <S%G942><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> spoke <S%G3004><s%> to him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'I am the God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Jacob <S%G2384><s%>'?
"He is not the God <S%G2316><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> but of the living; <S%G2198><s%> you are greatly <S%G4183><s%> mistaken. <S%G4105><s%>"

And one <S%G1520><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> them arguing, <S%G4802><s%> and recognizing <S%G3708><s%> that He had answered <S%G611><s%> them well, <S%G2573><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> Him, "What <S%G4169><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> is the foremost <S%G4413><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "The foremost <S%G4413><s%> is, 'Hear, <S%G191><s%> O Israel! <S%G2474><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> our God <S%G2316><s%> is one <S%G1520><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

and you shall love <S%G25><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> with all <S%G3650><s%> your heart, <S%G2588><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your soul, <S%G5590><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your mind, <S%G1271><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your strength. <S%G2479><s%>'

"The second <S%G1208><s%> is this, <S%G3778><s%> 'You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>' There is no <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> than these. <S%G3778><s%>"

And the scribe <S%G1122><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Right, <S%G2573><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> You have truly <S%G1909><s%> <S%G225><s%> stated <S%G3004><s%> that He is One; <S%G1520><s%> and there is no <S%G3756><s%> one <S%G243><s%> else <S%G243><s%> besides <S%G4133><s%> Him;

and to love <S%G25><s%> Him with all <S%G3650><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> the understanding <S%G4907><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> the strength, <S%G2479><s%> and to love <S%G25><s%> one's neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as himself, <S%G1438><s%> is much <S%G4053><s%> more <S%G4053><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> burnt <S%G3646><s%> offerings <S%G3646><s%> and sacrifices. <S%G2378><s%> "

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> that he had answered <S%G611><s%> intelligently, <S%G3562><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "You are not far <S%G3112><s%> from the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>" And after that, no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> would venture <S%G5111><s%> to ask <S%G1905><s%> Him any <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> questions. <S%G1905><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> [began] to say, <S%G3004><s%> as He taught <S%G1321><s%> in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> [is it that] the scribes <S%G1122><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that the Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G7035><s%>?

"David <S%G7035><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> 'The Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to my Lord, <S%G2962><s%> "Sit <S%G2521><s%> at My right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G1188><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> I put <S%G5087><s%> Thine <S%G4771><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> beneath <S%G5270><s%> Thy feet. <S%G4228><s%>'"

" David <S%G7035><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> calls <S%G3004><s%> Him 'Lord <S%G2962><s%>'; and [so] in what <S%G4159><s%> sense <S%G4159><s%> is He his son <S%G5207><s%>?" And the great <S%G4183><s%> crowd <S%G3793><s%> enjoyed <S%G2234><s%> listening <S%G191><s%> to Him.

And in His teaching <S%G1322><s%> He was saying: <S%G3004><s%> "Beware <S%G991><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> who like <S%G2309><s%> to walk <S%G4043><s%> around <S%G4043><s%> in long <S%G4749><s%> robes, <S%G4749><s%> and [like] respectful greetings <S%G783><s%> in the market <S%G58><s%> places, <S%G58><s%>
and chief <S%G4410><s%> seats <S%G4410><s%> in the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and places <S%G4411><s%> of honor <S%G4411><s%> at banquets, <S%G1173><s%>

who devour <S%G2719><s%> widows' houses, <S%G3614><s%> and for appearance's sake <S%G4392><s%> offer <S%G4336><s%> long <S%G3117><s%> prayers; <S%G4336><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> will receive <S%G2983><s%> greater <S%G4053><s%> condemnation. <S%G2917><s%> "

And He sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> opposite <S%G2713><s%> the treasury, <S%G1049><s%> and [began] observing <S%G2334><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> were putting <S%G906><s%> money <S%G5475><s%> into the treasury; <S%G1049><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> people <S%G4145><s%> were putting <S%G906><s%> in large <S%G4183><s%> sums. <S%G4183><s%>

And a poor <S%G4434><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and put <S%G906><s%> in two <S%G1417><s%> small <S%G3016><s%> copper <S%G3016><s%> coins, <S%G3016><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> amount <S%G1510><s%> to a cent. <S%G2835><s%>

And calling <S%G4341><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> to Him, He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, this <S%G3778><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> put <S%G906><s%> in more <S%G4183><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> the contributors <S%G906><s%> to the treasury; <S%G1049><s%>

for they all <S%G3956><s%> put <S%G906><s%> in out of their surplus, <S%G4052><s%> but she, out of her poverty, <S%G5304><s%> put <S%G906><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3745><s%> she owned, <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> she had to live <S%G979><s%> on. "
